How can I use the `getreceivedbyaddress` command to get the total amount received by an address with at least 6 confirmations?

You can use the `getreceivedbyaddress` command with a `minconf` value of 6 to only include transactions with at least 6 confirmations. For example: `verus getreceivedbyaddress "RD6GgnrMpPaTSMn8vai6yiGA7mN4QGPV" 6`

getreceivedbyaddress "VRSC_address" ( minconf ) Returns the total amount received by the given VRSC address in transactions with at least minconf confirmations. Arguments: 1. "VRSC_address" (string, required) The VRSC address for transactions. 2. minconf       (numeric, optional, default=1) Only include transactions confirmed at least this many times. Result: amount  (numeric) The total amount in VRSC received at this address. Examples: The amount from transactions with at least 1 confirmation > verus getreceivedbyaddress "RD6GgnrMpPaTSMn8vai6yiGA7mN4QGPV" The amount including unconfirmed transactions, zero confirmations > verus getreceivedbyaddress "RD6GgnrMpPaTSMn8vai6yiGA7mN4QGPV" 0 The amount with at least 6 confirmations, very safe > verus getreceivedbyaddress "RD6GgnrMpPaTSMn8vai6yiGA7mN4QGPV" 6 As a json rpc call > curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "getreceivedbyaddress", "params": ["RD6GgnrMpPaTSMn8vai6yiGA7mN4QGPV", 6] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
